author: pquerna
msg: Hey look, the latest commit to mod_info closes a PR from 1998.
In other news, it looks like 99% of the bugs in that part of the STATUS file

author: pquerna
msg: Rewrote config tree walk using recursion the way God intended.
Added ?config option. Added printout of config filename and line numbers.

author: pquerna
msg: use -z7 in the example cvs checkouts for APR/APR-Util.
Makes the checkout go much faster on slow dialup modems...

author: stoddard
msg: ifndef AP_UNSAFE_ERROR_LOG_UNESCAPED the stderr to errorlog stuff
for those who don't want to escape (as in server/log.c)
